description: Speed provides a GPS based speedometer for your Palm Pre or Pixi.  Speed continuously shows your current velocity and the GPS accuracy of your device with an easy to read signal bar icon. Options for showing compass heading, maximum speed, all time maximum speed, and average speed are available. Speed works over land, water, or in the air. Speed supports preferences for MPH/KPH display, selectable backgrounds, normal or statistics display, decimal places, compass heading, keeping the screen on, and pausing when in the background to conserve battery. New in Version 1.2.3 are the preferences for keeping the screen on and the statistics mode with maximum and average speeds (note: does not track maximum & average speed when the screen is locked).  Version 1.2.5 contains revised German translations.
